title: Life in the Orkneys
creator_credit: Films of Scotland Committee and Alan Harper
brief_description: An impression of life in the Orkneys. Surveys the history of the islands. Shows the mechanised farms which carry herds of beef and dairy cattle, sheep and other livestock. Mentions local industries, including poultry, cheese and whiskey making. Describes the community life of the islanders today, including art exhibitions, music and drama performances.
